questions.question: What is the invalid attributes of the annotation javax.servlet.annotation.WebFilter?
What is the default value of the type attribute for the <fmt:formatDate> actions?
Which is not a directive?
When a JSP directive will execute/invoked?
options: JSP directive will never get called.

questions.question: Which of the following is true about isELIgnored Attribute?
options: The isELIgnored option gives you the ability to disable the evaluation of scriplets.
The isELIgnored option gives you the ability to disable the evaluation of java code in jsp.
The isELIgnored option gives you the ability to disable the evaluation of EL.
questions.answer: The isELIgnored option gives you the ability to disable the evaluation of EL.

questions.question: When using the <fmt:formatNumber> action the numeric value to be formatted can be specified using the value attribute or when omitted read from where?
options: The value attribute is mandatory and must be specified
The value attribute is treated as a null value
The numeric value can be read from the tag's body content
questions.answer: The numeric value can be read from the tag's body content

questions.question: Which of the elements defined within the taglib element of taglib descriptor file are required. Select the two correct answers.
Which of the following is true about <jsp:forward> action?
options: The forward action terminates the action of the current page.
The forward action forwards the request to another resource such as a static page, another JSP page, or a Java Servlet.

questions.question: What gets printed when the following expression is evaluated? Select the one correct answer. ${ (1==2) ? 4 : 5 }
How to pass information from JSP to included JSP?
What is the use of <c:if> tag?
options: It is used to check if jsp tag library is enabled or not.
It evaluates an expression and displays its body content only if the expression evaluates to true.
questions.answer: It evaluates an expression and displays its body content only if the expression evaluates to true.

questions.question: JSP includes a mechanism for defining …………………………. or custom tags.

What type of error object is thrown from the <c:catch> tag?
What is the default value of the type attribute for the <fmt:formatNumber> and actions?
What happens if a query using the <sql:query> action produces no results?
options: An empty Result object is returned
A Result object is returned containing a null record
questions.answer: An empty Result object is returned
